content: Mary non permette ai suoi figli di farlo.
translations: eng:Mary doesn't allow her children to do that
eng:Mary doesn't allow her kids to do that
eng:Mary doesn't let her kids do that
eng:Mary doesn't permit her children to do that
eng:Mary doesn't permit her kids to do that
